title: Sherwood Type Collection
content:
Sherwood Type is a [P22](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000856/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22) division featuring The Sherwood Type Collection which contains designs created over the last forty years by master typographer [Ted Staunton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000856/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ted%20Staunton), and to which P22 acquired exclusive distribution rights.

[http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000856/http:/www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/index.html "http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/index.html")
author: James Grieshaber
